jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Build and maintain modern, responsive user interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver accessible, high-performance web experiences across browsers and devices.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend services and REST APIs. Optimize database performance, ensure system security, and support cloud-based applications used by thousands of active users.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Create intuitive user experiences through research-driven design. Produce wireframes, prototypes, and design systems while collaborating closely with developers to ensure usability and visual consistency.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage cloud infrastructure and automate CI/CD pipelines. Ensure system reliability, scalability, and security while improving deployment workflows and monitoring production environments.

jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: Assist in building and maintaining responsive websites. Work with senior developers to fix bugs, implement new features, and learn modern development workflows in a fast-paced startup environment.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product strategy from concept to launch. Define roadmaps, gather requirements, prioritize features, and coordinate cross-functional teams to deliver valuable, user-focused solutions.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze complex datasets to uncover trends and insights. Build dashboards and reports that support data-driven decision-making across marketing, operations, and executive teams.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Ensure smooth performance, clean architecture, and consistent user experiences on both iOS and Android platforms.

jobs.title: QA Engineer
jobs.description: Test web applications through manual and automated methods. Identify bugs, verify fixes, and collaborate with developers to ensure reliable, high-quality releases before production.

jobs.title: Game Developer
jobs.description: Develop interactive browser-based games with a retro-inspired aesthetic. Implement gameplay mechanics, animations, and performance optimizations using JavaScript and Three.js.
